roleset.name: start up a topic
roleset.note: BROACH-V NOTES: Based on ectb. (from broach.01-v)

example.text: No one was even allowed [*] to broach the subject of human rights during the period of martial law , and though it was a cherished goal of activists , their efforts were limited [*]to the political realm .
example.arg: during the period of martial law
